Quote.Author: Ruth Reichl
Quote.QuoteValue: I like poached eggs, but I'll make scrambled or fried or whatever anybody wants

Quote.Author: Ruth Reichl
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't live without butter. Butter is probably my single favourite food

Quote.Author: Ruth Reichl
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing about food is my default

Quote.Author: Ruth Reichl
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I hate any food trends

Quote.Author: Ruth Reichl
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to figure out a way of living where I didn't have to be in an office every day

Quote.Author: Ruth Rendell
Quote.QuoteValue: The knives of jealousy are honed on details

Quote.Author: Ruth Rendell
Quote.QuoteValue: I really do literally put myself into a character's shoes

Quote.Author: Ruth Rendell
Quote.QuoteValue: I think to be driven to want to kill must be such a terrible burden

Quote.Author: Ruth Rendell
Quote.QuoteValue: I try, and I think I succeed, in making my readers feel pity for my psychopaths, because I do

Quote.Author: Ruth Rendell
Quote.QuoteValue: Women's rights are more important than their ethnic rights

Quote.Author: Ruth Rendell
Quote.QuoteValue: What I mind in modern society very much is the awful lack of grammar

Quote.Author: Ruth Rendell
Quote.QuoteValue: I love memory sticks. They seem to me to be magic

Quote.Author: Ruth Rendell
Quote.QuoteValue: Reading taught me how to write

Quote.Author: Ruth Rendell
Quote.QuoteValue: I was imbued from a very early age with a sense of doom

Quote.Author: Ruth Rendell
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a soft spot for charities that help children

Quote.Author: Rutherford B. Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: To vote is like the payment of a debt, a duty never to be neglected, if its performance is possible

Quote.Author: Rutherford B. Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: He serves his party best who serves his country best

Quote.Author: Rutherford B. Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Virtue is defined to be mediocrity, of which either extreme is vice

Quote.Author: Rutherford B. Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: The independence of all political and other bother is a happiness

Quote.Author: Rutherford B. Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: No person connected with me by blood or marriage will be appointed to office

Quote.Author: Rutherford B. Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a radical in thought (and principle) and a conservative in method (and conduct)

Quote.Author: Rutherford B. Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Universal suffrage is sound in principle. The radical element is right

Quote.Author: Rutherford B. Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Unjust attacks on public men do them more good than unmerited praise

Quote.Author: Rutherford B. Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: Must swear off from swearing. Bad habit

Quote.Author: Rutherford B. Hayes
Quote.QuoteValue: The progress of society is mainly the improvement in the condition of the workingmen of the world

Quote.Author: Ryan Gosling
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom is such a gift

Quote.Author: Ryan Gosling
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to discriminate against genres

Quote.Author: Ryan Gosling
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like everything has happened naturally

Quote.Author: Ryan Gosling
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm waiting to get old - I think old guys with tattoos look good

Quote.Author: Ryan Gosling
Quote.QuoteValue: I know there are only so many characters I'll be able to play

Quote.Author: Ryan Gosling
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up Mormon. I wasn't really Mormon, my parents were

Quote.Author: Ryan Gosling
Quote.QuoteValue: There's good things about going to church

Quote.Author: Ryan Gosling
Quote.QuoteValue: If people want to put me up on their walls, I'll love it

Quote.Author: Ryan Gosling
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we just knew that we had a movie when Rachel walked in the room

Quote.Author: Ryan Gosling
Quote.QuoteValue: You know us crazy kids. We'll do anything crazy to our hair

Quote.Author: Ryan Lochte
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe everyone has a soul mate that they can spend the rest of their life together

Quote.Author: Ryan Lochte
Quote.QuoteValue: Not to have a big head about it, but people love me

Quote.Author: Ryan Lochte
Quote.QuoteValue: Abe Lincoln is my favorite president of all time - and he pulls off that top hat pretty well

Quote.Author: Ryan Lochte
Quote.QuoteValue: I might wear my pink Speedo. I think I should

Quote.Author: Ryan Lochte
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to focus on speed, doing little things like my turns and my starts - just speed

Quote.Author: Ryan Lochte
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate to lose. I like winning

Quote.Author: Ryan Lochte
Quote.QuoteValue: If I break my ankle right now, this Olympics wasn't meant to be

Quote.Author: Ryan Lochte
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, you pick and choose your battles

Quote.Author: Ryan Lochte
Quote.QuoteValue: I want people to see the passion I have for swimming and become more involved in the sport

Quote.Author: Ryan Lochte
Quote.QuoteValue: My philosophy is if you're a man at night, you gotta be a man in the morning

Quote.Author: Ryan Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have expectations, you are setting yourself up for disappointment

Quote.Author: Ryan Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: Are you stalking me? Because that would be super

Quote.Author: Ryan Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: The stunts on the ground I can do, but I've never been good with heights

Quote.Author: Ryan Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a really nervous kid. I was extremely sensitive. Incredibly perceptive

Quote.Author: Ryan Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had an alarming amount of concussions

Quote.Author: Ryan Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: I feared disappointing my father more than anything in the world

Quote.Author: Ryan Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: Any kind of crisis can be good. It wakes you up

Quote.Author: Ryan Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: People have their complexities. They have their heroic moments and their villainous moments, too

Quote.Author: Ryan Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: Guys are lucky: We can wear a suit over and over, just with different shirts and ties

Quote.Author: Ryan Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had the pretty good fortune of working with some decent guys and gals

Quote.Author: Ryan Seacrest
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm obsessed with fresh breath

Quote.Author: Ryan Seacrest
Quote.QuoteValue: The combination of a blazer over any T-shirt with a pair of jeans is foolproof

Quote.Author: Ryan Seacrest
Quote.QuoteValue: Trust me, if I were gay I'd be getting more action than I'm getting now

Quote.Author: Ryan Seacrest
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that one of the things I've tried to do is work hard and take the business very seriously

Quote.Author: Ryan Seacrest
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope I can help guys come out and say, 'All right, dude, I got a manicure... and I liked it.'

Quote.Author: Ryan Seacrest
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people meet people in the grocery store, but I get my tomatoes and I'm out

Quote.Author: Ryan Seacrest
Quote.QuoteValue: I work best inundated with things, when it's like raining information

Quote.Author: Ryan Seacrest
Quote.QuoteValue: I use every opportunity, whether on my radio show or on television, to break stereotypes

Quote.Author: Ryan Seacrest
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew I could control one thing, and that is my time and my hours and my effort and my efficiency

Quote.Author: Ryan Seacrest
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never done Botox in my life. But I've probably tried everything else under the sun

Quote.Author: Ryne Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I was in the postseason twice and I'm thankful for that

Quote.Author: Ryne Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: If you played the game the right way, played the game for the team, good things would happen

Quote.Author: Ryne Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom was at every single game I played as a kid, rain or shine

Quote.Author: Ryne Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of people say this honor validates my career, but I didn't work hard for validation

Quote.Author: Ryne Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't play the game right because I saw a reward at the end of the tunnel

Quote.Author: Ryne Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I played it right because that's what you're supposed to do - play it right and with respect

Quote.Author: Ryne Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: In baseball, there's always the next day

Quote.Author: Ryne Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I have great memories of being a Cub, and I'm happy building new ones with the Phillies

Quote.Author: Ryne Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I was in awe every time I walked on to the field

Quote.Author: Ryne Sandberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Baseball wasn't easy for me

Quote.Author: S. Truett Cathy
Quote.QuoteValue: I had to create some good work habits and attitude

Quote.Author: S. Truett Cathy
Quote.QuoteValue: Why would I retire from something I enjoy doing? I can hardly wait to get here

Quote.Author: S. Truett Cathy
Quote.QuoteValue: I cook chicken for a living

Quote.Author: S. Truett Cathy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to be remembered as one who kept my priorities in the right order

Quote.Author: S. Truett Cathy
Quote.QuoteValue: If a man can't manage his own life, he can't manage a business

Quote.Author: S. Truett Cathy
Quote.QuoteValue: Why did the chicken cross the road? To prove to the possum that it could be done

Quote.Author: S. Truett Cathy
Quote.QuoteValue: We tell applicants, 'If you don't intend to be here for life, you needn't apply.'

Quote.Author: S. Truett Cathy
Quote.QuoteValue: Chick-fil-A is what it is today because of its people, purpose and product

Quote.Author: S. Truett Cathy
Quote.QuoteValue: Putting people before profits is how we've tried to operate from the beginning

Quote.Author: S. Truett Cathy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd be resentful if shareholders who don't know the business tried to tell me what to do

Quote.Author: Sachin Tendulkar
Quote.QuoteValue: I have played for 15 years and it has been a dream

Quote.Author: Sachin Tendulkar
Quote.QuoteValue: I just keep it simple. Watch the ball and play it on merit

Quote.Author: Sachin Tendulkar
Quote.QuoteValue: But eventually it is a game of cricket

Quote.Author: Sachin Tendulkar
Quote.QuoteValue: Every individual has his own style, his own way of presenting himself on and off the field

Quote.Author: Sachin Tendulkar
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to continue the way I am going

Quote.Author: Sachin Tendulkar
Quote.QuoteValue: If one man is representing India in cricket, then yes, blame that person when things go wrong

Quote.Author: Sachin Tendulkar
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to give my six hours of serious cricket on the ground and then take whatever the result

Quote.Author: Sachin Tendulkar
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never tried to compare myself to anyone else

Quote.Author: Sachin Tendulkar
Quote.QuoteValue: At least with me, the match starts much, much earlier than the actual match

Quote.Author: Sachin Tendulkar
Quote.QuoteValue: I always had a dream to play for India but I never let it put pressure on me

Quote.Author: Sade Adu
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a mother you must be strong. Even if you don't feel it, you have to pretend

Quote.Author: Sade Adu
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you only really feel like an outsider if you've been an insider

Quote.Author: Sade Adu
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like looking outrageous

Quote.Author: Sade Adu
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't get easily bored. I'm not that kind of person

Quote.Author: Sade Adu
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got absolutely no real perception, properly, of time

Quote.Author: Sade Adu
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not shy or reclusive. I just spend my time with people rather than journalists

Quote.Author: Sade Adu
Quote.QuoteValue: When I go into the studio, I completely detach. I let my emotions come out

Quote.Author: Sade Adu
Quote.QuoteValue: I just aspire to pick people up. That's my ambition

Quote.Author: Sade Adu
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm uneasy with fame so I do my best to avoid places that will bring me more attention

Quote.Author: Sade Adu
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not over the top; I'm not wacky. I'm fairly understated, and that reflects in the way I sing

Quote.Author: Sai Baba
Quote.QuoteValue: All action results from thought, so it is thoughts that matter

Quote.Author: Sai Baba
Quote.QuoteValue: You must pass your days in song. Let your whole life be a song

Quote.Author: Sai Baba
Quote.QuoteValue: The life ahead can only be glorious if you learn to live in total harmony with the Lord

Quote.Author: Sai Baba
Quote.QuoteValue: My eye is ever on those who love me

Quote.Author: Sai Baba
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the Attributeless, Absolute, Nirguna. I have no name, no residence

Quote.Author: Sai Baba
Quote.QuoteValue: I shall be active and vigorous even from the tomb

Quote.Author: Sai Baba
Quote.QuoteValue: I give people what they want in the hope that they will begin to want what I want to give them!

Quote.Author: Sai Baba
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the protector of all lives. I am present even before the creation. I am prime God

Quote.Author: Sai Baba
Quote.QuoteValue: If you seek my help and guidance, I will immediately give it to you

Quote.Author: Sai Baba
Quote.QuoteValue: My tomb shall bless and speak to the needs of my devotees

Quote.Author: Saint Ambrose
Quote.QuoteValue: A kindness received should be returned with a freer hand

Quote.Author: Saint Ambrose
Quote.QuoteValue: Where a man's heart is, there is his treasure also

Quote.Author: Saint Ambrose
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not enough just to wish well; we must also do well

Quote.Author: Saint Ambrose
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing evil save that which perverts the mind and shackles the conscience

Quote.Author: Saint Ambrose
Quote.QuoteValue: In some causes silence is dangerous

Quote.Author: Saint Ambrose
Quote.QuoteValue: When in Rome, live as the Romans do; when elsewhere, live as they live elsewhere

Quote.Author: Saint Ambrose
Quote.QuoteValue: No one is good but God alone. What is good is therefore divine, what is divine is therefore good

Quote.Author: Saint Ambrose
Quote.QuoteValue: The emperor is in the Church, not above the Church

Quote.Author: Saint Ambrose
Quote.QuoteValue: Take away the contests of the martyrs, and you have taken away their crowns

Quote.Author: Saint Ambrose
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to use the gold of the Redeemer is for the redemption of those in peril

Quote.Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote.QuoteValue: A quarrel between friends, when made up, adds a new tie to friendship

Quote.Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not lose courage in considering your own imperfections

Quote.Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote.QuoteValue: Have patience with all things, But, first of all with yourself

Quote.Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength

Quote.Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote.QuoteValue: Be who you are and be that well

Quote.Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not wish to be anything but what you are, and try to be that perfectly

Quote.Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote.QuoteValue: True progress quietly and persistently moves along without notice

Quote.Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who love to be feared fear to be loved

Quote.Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote.QuoteValue: While I am busy with little things, I am not required to do greater things

Quote.Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote.QuoteValue: Reputation is rarely proportioned to virtue

Quote.Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote.QuoteValue: The tree that is beside the running water is fresher and gives more fruit

Quote.Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote.QuoteValue: More tears are shed over answered prayers than unanswered ones

Quote.Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not fear Satan half so much as I fear those who fear him

Quote.Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote.QuoteValue: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself

Quote.Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who truly loves God travels securely

Quote.Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain is never permanent

Quote.Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote.QuoteValue: To have courage for whatever comes in life - everything lies in that

Quote.Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote.QuoteValue: All things must come to the soul from its roots, from where it is planted

Quote.Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote.QuoteValue: Accustom yourself continually to make many acts of love, for they enkindle and melt the soul

Quote.Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote.QuoteValue: The feeling remains that God is on the journey, too

Quote.Author: Sallust
Quote.QuoteValue: Neither soldiers nor money can defend a king but only friends won by good deeds, merit, and honesty

Quote.Author: Sallust
Quote.QuoteValue: Harmony makes small things grow, lack of it makes great things decay

Quote.Author: Sallust
Quote.QuoteValue: In battle it is the cowards who run the most risk; bravery is a rampart of defense

Quote.Author: Sallust
Quote.QuoteValue: Do as much as possible, and talk of yourself as little as possible

Quote.Author: Sallust
Quote.QuoteValue: In my opinion it is less shameful for a king to be overcome by force of arms than by bribery

Quote.Author: Sallust
Quote.QuoteValue: Think like a man of action, and act like a man of thought

Quote.Author: Sallust
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man is the architect of his own fortune

Quote.Author: Sallust
Quote.QuoteValue: All who consult on doubtful matters, should be void of hatred, friendship, anger, and pity

Quote.Author: Sallust
Quote.QuoteValue: We employ the mind to rule, the body to serve

Quote.Author: Sallust
Quote.QuoteValue: Necessity makes even the timid brave

Quote.Author: Sally Field
Quote.QuoteValue: It took me a long time not to judge myself through someone else's eyes

Quote.Author: Sally Field
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't deny the fact that you like me! You like me!

Quote.Author: Sally Field
Quote.QuoteValue: I never really address myself to any image anybody has of me. That's like fighting with ghosts

Quote.Author: Sally Field
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that's very sad, that I haven't allowed my heart to be broken. I have broken a few

Quote.Author: Sally Field
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was born, the doctor looked at my mother and said, 'Congratulations, you have an actor!'

Quote.Author: Sally Field
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Forrest Gump' is filled full of moments where your heart just cheers

Quote.Author: Sally Field
Quote.QuoteValue: You just do the best you can with what you've got... and sometimes magic strikes

Quote.Author: Sally Field
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done some good work and some not-good work

Quote.Author: Sally Field
Quote.QuoteValue: My agent said, 'You aren't good enough for movies.' I said, 'You're fired.'

Quote.Author: Sally Field
Quote.QuoteValue: If I hadn't fought back, I might have been Gidget forever

Quote.Author: Sally Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole nature of photography has changed with the advent of a camera in everybody's hand

Quote.Author: Sally Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: I just started taking pictures, and it was - it was an instant love affair. It was just ecstatic

Quote.Author: Sally Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Death makes us sad, but it can also make us feel more alive

Quote.Author: Sally Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Very few males have the confidence to appear vulnerable

Quote.Author: Sally Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: If I take enough pictures, I'm going to get a good one, and I know not to stop at a bad one

Quote.Author: Sally Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I have a certain willingness for audacity

Quote.Author: Sally Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a vivid, apocalyptic imagination

Quote.Author: Sally Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Weeks go by, and I don't talk to another living soul

Quote.Author: Sally Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: I work all the time. I never leave home. I mean, I just stay honed in on what's ahead

Quote.Author: Sally Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: I never read about photography

Quote.Author: Sally Ride
Quote.QuoteValue: I've spent my whole life not talking to people, and I don't see why I should start now

Quote.Author: Sally Ride
Quote.QuoteValue: But when I wasn't working, I was usually at a window looking down at Earth

Quote.Author: Sally Ride
Quote.QuoteValue: All adventures, especially into new territory, are scary

Quote.Author: Sally Ride
Quote.QuoteValue: Rocket science is tough, and rockets have a way of failing

Quote.Author: Sally Ride
Quote.QuoteValue: The stars don't look bigger, but they do look brighter

Quote.Author: Sally Ride
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're getting ready to launch into space, you're sitting on a big explosion waiting to happen

Quote.Author: Sally Ride
Quote.QuoteValue: Because I was a tennis player, Billie Jean King was a hero of mine

Quote.Author: Sally Ride
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, I did feel a special responsibility to be the first American woman in space

Quote.Author: Sally Ride
Quote.QuoteValue: So most astronauts are astronauts for a couple of years before they are assigned to a flight

Quote.Author: Sally Ride
Quote.QuoteValue: The view of Earth is spectacular

Quote.Author: Salma Hayek
Quote.QuoteValue: If I go on a diet and work out, I'm always in a bad mood. I'd rather be a little heavier but nice

Quote.Author: Salma Hayek
Quote.QuoteValue: My driving abilities from Mexico have helped me get through Hollywood

Quote.Author: Salma Hayek
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't try to dress like me or wear your hair like mine. Find your own style

Quote.Author: Salma Hayek
Quote.QuoteValue: My heart has been stolen too - but I've gone and got it back every single time!

Quote.Author: Salma Hayek
Quote.QuoteValue: How I would describe my characters is absolutely different from how I would describe myself

Quote.Author: Salma Hayek
Quote.QuoteValue: I aim for a lifetime full of movies

Quote.Author: Salma Hayek
Quote.QuoteValue: I directed a movie and now, I'm going to do the editing

Quote.Author: Salma Hayek
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm good at working, but I'm very good at playing

Quote.Author: Salma Hayek
Quote.QuoteValue: Producing is hell, writing is frustrating, acting is really satisfying, directing is heaven

Quote.Author: Salma Hayek
Quote.QuoteValue: What is important is to believe in something so strongly that you're never discouraged

Quote.Author: Salman Rushdie
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes legends make reality, and become more useful than the facts

Quote.Author: Salman Rushdie
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the extraordinary things about human events is that the unthinkable becomes thinkable

Quote.Author: Salman Rushdie
Quote.QuoteValue: Vertigo is the conflict between the fear of falling and the desire to fall

Quote.Author: Salman Rushdie
Quote.QuoteValue: A mature society understands that at the heart of democracy is argument

Quote.Author: Salman Rushdie
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is a very abnormal place

Quote.Author: Salman Rushdie
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as perfect security, only varying levels of insecurity

Quote.Author: Salman Rushdie
Quote.QuoteValue: You can take the boy out of Bombay; you can't take Bombay out of the boy, you know

Quote.Author: Salman Rushdie
Quote.QuoteValue: It is very, very easy not to be offended by a book. You just have to shut it

Quote.Author: Salman Rushdie
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate admitting that my enemies have a point

Quote.Author: Salman Rushdie
Quote.QuoteValue: Be sure that you go to the author to get at his meaning, not to find yours

Quote.Author: Sam Brownback
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad farmed, my granddad was a farmer. I wanted to be a farmer

Quote.Author: Sam Brownback
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's create a legal system that can work

Quote.Author: Sam Brownback
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think there should be more gun control. I think there should be more education

Quote.Author: Sam Brownback
Quote.QuoteValue: Refugees are the human dimensions of a failed state

Quote.Author: Sam Brownback
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the real needs in the country are for cultural renewal

Quote.Author: Sam Brownback
Quote.QuoteValue: I've served on the International Relations Committee

Quote.Author: Sam Brownback
Quote.QuoteValue: We must take proactive steps to promote democracy and human rights abroad

Quote.Author: Sam Brownback
Quote.QuoteValue: I do think there's a lot more we can do on the life agenda

Quote.Author: Sam Brownback
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoyed working with Ted Kennedy

Quote.Author: Sam Brownback
Quote.QuoteValue: The next president needs to know foreign policy and not learn it on the job

Quote.Author: Sam Hunt
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people don't like long bus rides, but I love them. There's sort of a sense of solitude

Quote.Author: Sam Hunt
Quote.QuoteValue: By no means do I want to try to leave country music. That's absolutely where I want to stay

Quote.Author: Sam Hunt
Quote.QuoteValue: I get the best inspiration or the most creativity from real emotions

Quote.Author: Sam Hunt
Quote.QuoteValue: New experiences give you new perspectives on life

Quote.Author: Sam Hunt
Quote.QuoteValue: I think of a song in terms of lyrics and stories, and that's what keeps it country for me

Quote.Author: Sam Hunt
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being outside, I do a lot of hunting

Quote.Author: Sam Hunt
Quote.QuoteValue: A good story gives you more of a license to be forward and progressive with the music

Quote.Author: Sam Hunt
Quote.QuoteValue: It's good to be proud of your heritage and your culture, but pride can be perverted

Quote.Author: Sam Hunt
Quote.QuoteValue: I study what's happening in music. I want to sound different than everybody else

Quote.Author: Sam Hunt
Quote.QuoteValue: My golf game is lacking big time

Quote.Author: Sam Kinison
Quote.QuoteValue: Stand-up comedy is an art form and it dies unless you expand it

Quote.Author: Sam Kinison
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm attracted to heartbreakers

Quote.Author: Sam Kinison
Quote.QuoteValue: My view of life is, 'If you're going to miss Heaven, why miss it by two inches? Miss it!

Quote.Author: Sam Kinison
Quote.QuoteValue: If I get married again, I want a guy there with a drum to do rimshots during the vows

Quote.Author: Sam Kinison
Quote.QuoteValue: Rage only works if it is justified. That's the trick with rage. You gotta have a reason to be mad

Quote.Author: Sam Kinison
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess my main influences are Jesus, rock 'n' roll and ex-wives. In that order

Quote.Author: Sam Kinison
Quote.QuoteValue: Folks, I've been straight for seventeen days... Not all in a row

Quote.Author: Sam Kinison
Quote.QuoteValue: It was like going to church, except Ozzy Osbourne was there

Quote.Author: Sam Kinison
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't worry about terrorism. I was married for two years

Quote.Author: Sam Kinison
Quote.QuoteValue: Obviously I'm not a role model for impressionable youth

Quote.Author: Sam Levenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Insanity is hereditary; you get it from your children

Quote.Author: Sam Levenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going

Quote.Author: Sam Levenson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you die in an elevator, be sure to push the Up button

Quote.Author: Sam Levenson
Quote.QuoteValue: The simplest toy, one which even the youngest child can operate, is called a grandparent

Quote.Author: Sam Levenson
Quote.QuoteValue: The reason grandparents and grandchildren get along so well is that they have a common enemy

Quote.Author: Sam Levenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Lead us not into temptation. Just tell us where it is; we'll find it

Quote.Author: Sam Levenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is a by-product. You cannot pursue it by itself

Quote.Author: Sam Levenson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's so simple to be wise. Just think of something stupid to say and say the opposite

Quote.Author: Sam Levenson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to stop putting things off, starting tomorrow!

Quote.Author: Sam Levenson
Quote.QuoteValue: Just try to be happy. Unhappiness starts with wanting to be happier

Quote.Author: Sam Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't go out of my way to get into this movie stuff. I think of myself as a writer

Quote.Author: Sam Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: I think without writing I would feel completely useless

Quote.Author: Sam Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: All of the great writers whom I admire have died. I guess the most recent one would be Marquez

Quote.Author: Sam Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't make a living as a playwright. You can barely scrape by

Quote.Author: Sam Shepard
Quote.QuoteValue: Hollywood is geared toward teenage idiocy
